喜歡喝琴酒或愛喝茶的人一定要來嘗試

The atmosphere is delicious and the sober is handsome and gentleman
The overall store on the store is lingering the natural style of simplicity and irregularity
Music atmosphere soft and brisk

Original: 調酒清香順口，餐點一點都不馬虎，很美味。廁所希望能夠亮一點，音樂稍微大聲。
EN: The bartending fragrance is smooth, the meal is not sloppy at all, it is delicious.The toilet hopes to light up, and the music is loud.

Original:
超有氛圍感的一間餐酒吧，融入洞穴石材感，植物和原木，一看就知道重本打造。這邊對風味超級講究，大多是以草本植物入酒，我點了一杯「五葉松」，基酒是琴酒，元素有綠豆蔻、蘋果、蜂蜜。

調酒師說這杯有芭樂皮味但沒有加芭樂，以跑Bar經驗來說我想應該就是淡淡的味道。結果靠北芭樂味超重明顯（因為我自己很喜歡芭樂），他說只要說有那個味道，客人一定要很明顯喝得到，不然就不要講。我嚇到，真的要對風味搭配很有研究才能做到這樣⋯很厲害真的沒有在跟你開玩笑。

也有超好喝的茶酒系列，有碧螺春、青心烏龍、焙香烏龍、金萱烏龍、東方美人、文山包種，超多，是和精品茶飲店《季緣》合作。

食物的部分很特別，有青蛙 X D（是指田雞），很酷，然後滷肉飯也很讚，有半熟蛋和雞腿肉，滷肉也很有膠質口感，不是一般看過的那種。
EN:
A bar with a sense of atmosphere, integrates into the sense of cave stone, plants and logs. At first glance, you know that it is built.Here I am very particular about the flavor. Most of them are into the wine with herbal plants. I ordered a cup of "Five Leaf Songs". The base wine is piano wine. The elements include mucus, apples, and honey.

The bartender said that this cup has a guava flavor but no Bara. In terms of running BAR, I think it should be a faint taste.As a result, the northern Barlite flavor was super heavy (because I like Bala very much). He said that as long as he said that the taste, the guests must clearly drink it, otherwise don't say.I was scared. I really have to study the flavor with the taste.

There are also super delicious tea and wine series, including Biluochun, Qingxin Oolong, Bakery Oolong, Jin Xuan Oolong, Oriental Beauty, Wenshan Bags, and there are many.

The food part is very special. There are frog X D (referring to field chicken). It is cool, and then braised pork rice is also very good. There are semi -cooked eggs and chicken legs. The braised meat is also very glue. It is not the one that has been seen.

Original: Cocktail好喝，調酒師也非常好聊，整體的氛圍很適合個人或攜伴前往，非常具有吸引力的店家。

Original:
看了這邊的菜單發現這家餐酒館是以香草植物以及茶葉為主題的酒館，非常具有特色的風格

五葉松
基底是琴酒，以綠豆蔻為主題的調酒
有芭樂表皮的清香味，搭配草本的香氣讓整體更有回甘的後韻，有加蜂蜜和蘋果做平衡，所以整體口味偏甜一點

茶酒-金萱烏龍
稍有氣泡感，雖然酒下比較重但沒有太重的酒感
聞起來有淡淡的奶香調，喝下去有淡淡的茶香和一點點微澀感，以及烏龍獨特的香氣
尾韻簡單收尾，非常順口

石竹葉
基底為琴酒，有紅綠紫蘇和白葡萄
有石竹葉特有的雨後甘露、竹葉香氣
尾韻香氣持續很久

洛神花
基底為蘋果白蘭地，有洛神、紅茶和多香果的元素
有一點紅茶本身的茶澀感，酸味沒比想像的重，味道類似無肉桂的熱紅酒香氣

小滷
豆干和海帶非常入味，上面有加蔥絲和七味粉點綴，彈牙好吃，不輸外面的滷味攤😋

After watching the menu here, I found that this dining tavern is a tavern with the theme of vanilla plants and tea. It has a very distinctive style.

Pine pine
Base is piano wine, bartending with the theme of mucmonre
With the fragrance of guava skin, with the aroma of herbal herbal to make the overall rhyme more back, there are honey and apples to balance, so the overall taste is a bit sweet

Tea wine-Jin Xuan oolong
Slightly bubble, although the wine is relatively heavy but there is no too heavy wine
It smells a faint milk fragrance, drinks a touch of tea and a little astringent, and the unique aroma of Oolong
The tail rhyme is easy to end, very smooth

Stone bamboo leaf

Luo Shenhua

Mour
Dryan and kelp are very delicious. There are onion and seven flavors on it. The elastic teeth are delicious.
